settings.title:
About
Stride
settings.subtitle: At Stride, we fuse cutting-edge technology with clinical compassion to make healthcare accessible and convenient for all.
settings.subtitle_2: Our solutions empower people to live life to the fullest, helping them overcome their pain and grow into the very best versions of themselves.

settings.title: We’re completely redefining the orthotic design experience to emphasize customer convenience and clinical quality.
settings.text: Our team of award-winning podiatrists factor hundreds of thousands of your data points into your remarkably personalized pair of orthotics.

settings.title:
Personalized Care,
Lasting Solutions
settings.text: Stride isn’t customized in the conventional sense –we help you overcome your problems permanently, enabling you to live happy, healthy, pain-free livesthrough exceptional, convenient healthcare solutions.

settings.title:
Our Story -
The Search for the
Ultimate Orthotic
settings.text: As far back as I can remember, I’ve had flat feet. Despite stretching, exercises, and buying over-the-counter insoles, I consistently had pain after walking just a few minutes. Three years ago, I decided to take matters into my own hands and go see a Podiatrist in anticipation of a exchange trip aboard. Nine hundred dollars, and two weeks later, my order was finally placed. Sadly, despite my repeated requests for rush delivery, I didn’t receive my orthotics in the 8 weeks leading up to the trip. Frustrated and in pain, I spent the next two months hobbling around France, wondering if there was a better system for ordering orthotics.
settings.name: Gregory Gerla

settings.title: Inspired Innovation
settings.text:
While in France, I met Dr. Zac Cartun, a physician with a passion for leveraging technology to improve patient care. Inspired by the forward-thinking clinics we visited in Europe, we discovered an opportunity to combine smartphone imaging and the latest additive printing technology to enable a more convenient, cheaper, and ultimately better orthotic.

The last step was finding our master craftsman. That year long search led us to a Oberlaken, Germany where Dominik and his father Dietmar Walter were designing orthotics with exceptional quality. I saw the hours they put into every pair, painstakingly designing based on the individual patients’ pains, conditions, and foot type. After I got my first pair from the Walters, I knew they were our guys.

Combining the Walter craftsmanship with our technology is what makes Stride special. I have seen these orthotics work wonders for my own flat foot pain. I am now able to compete in Ironman competitions which would have been impossible a few short years ago. I hope you are inspired by the Stride orthotics as I am.
